site_name: St Marys Primary School Masbro' RoadLondonW14 0LT
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: See map. T1) Tree of Heaven x 1 (Ailanthus altissima), reduce all aspects of the crown back to the previous pruning points (3 - 4 metres).T2&3) Ash x 2 (Fraxinus excelsior), reduce all aspects of the crown back to the previous pruning points (3 - 3.5 metres). T4&5) Sugar Maple x 2 (Acer saccharum), reduce all aspects of the crown back to the previous pruning points (4 metres). T6) Cherry x 1 (Prunus spp), reduce crown sides by 2 metres; remove all deadwood. T7) Cherry x 1 (Prunus spp), reduce crown sides by 2 metres; remove all deadwood. T9) Indian Bean Tree x 1 (Catalpa bignonioides), reduce all aspects of the crown back to the previous pruning points. (2 - 2.5 metres); remove deadwood.
